description:
Presentation will go in-depth on the architecture of a web application
service built on Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud infrastructure,
including:

-  developing a responsive, high-performance web application in Django
-  implementing a REST API for automating the web application
-  using Python's networking capabilities to monitor and aggregate log
   files from multiple remote servers in real time
-  automating deployment in Python using fabric
-  interacting with AWS using the boto library

From a business point of view I will also talk about the opportunities
that modern cloud computing platforms present to developers and how to
best exploit them.
